Comment: File with custom masks, which could be exported from an existing index or newly generated by "lexicmap utils masks". This flag oversides `-k/--kmer`, `-m/--masks`, `-s/--rand-seed`, et al.
► Bigger values improve the search specificity and do not increase the index size.
► Bigger values improve the search sensitivity, increase the index size, and slow down the search speed.

Function: Minimum length of shared substrings (anchors) in searching
Comment: This value is used to remove masks with a prefix of low-complexity.
